text: Valentino Zeichen (24 March 1938 - 5 July 2016), was an Italian poet and writer. He was born in Fiume, Italy. Zeichen's poetry has been praised for its ability to quickly hook the reader. His works include humor. A literary award named after him, the Premio Zeichen, is held every December in Rome. Zeichen himself was the only member of the jury. Zeichen died on 5 July 2016 in Rome, Italy, aged 78. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2016 deaths Category:20th-century Italian writers Category:Italian poets Category:21st- century Italian writers
title: Valentino Zeichen
